conversations.body_text: Hi Otto,     Is there any update. Was the parcel supposed to include the motors, the power supply and other brackets. All I got was 2 metal brackets in an envelope.     BR,  Jordan

Hi Otto,     I see that the parcel that is supposed to contain the pedals just entered Bulgaria today. That means will receive it in the next couple of days. Can I expect the haptic motors to be in that parcel?     Best regards,  Jordan

I didn'ty get an answer for a while. Not at all to be honest but there was no real problem so I guess it is fine. If would be nice to be more clear what parcel includes which parts of the bundle so customers do not get confused.
